plot: A Chicago cop finds a huge green-skinned mutant lying on the street. Suffering from amnesia, the mutant joins the Chicago police force to battle evil mutants lead by the mysterious Overlord and tries to uncover his own identity.
plot_en: A Chicago cop finds a huge green-skinned mutant lying on the street. Suffering from amnesia, the mutant joins the Chicago police force to battle evil mutants lead by the mysterious Overlord and tries to uncover his own identity.
plot_es: A Chicago cop finds a huge green-skinned mutant lying on the street. Suffering from amnesia, the mutant joins the Chicago police force to battle evil mutants lead by the mysterious Overlord and tries to uncover his own identity.
title: The Savage Dragon
